item.title: About
item.description: I’m Thomas Levesque, a French software developer from Paris. I’ve been programming in C# almost since the beginning, and I still love it. I’ve done a lot of desktop app development with WinForms and WPF, but nowadays my focus is mostly on ASP.NET Core. I’m a core maintainer of FakeItEasy, the easy mocking library for .NET. I also maintain a few personal open-source projects, which you can see on my Github account.
